name: LifeFacts
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill it is possible to learn real life facts thanks to a constantly updated list.
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone numbe


To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
